data.title: “Jobs of Tomorrow”: What’s in the Box?: Sustainability and Packaging
data.meta_description: In this "Jobs of Tomorrow" episode, we discuss the supply chain and their efforts to go green and produce sustainable packaging methods.
data.text:
Ever found yourself staring at a seemingly oversized package and wondering, “What’s in the box?” Well, this “Jobs of Tomorrow” episode has the answers you’re looking for. Join us in shedding light on the challenges and victories shaping the future of sustainable packaging in the industry. Starting with a light-hearted look back at the era of single-use plastic bags this episode talks about the current landscape dominated by reusable solutions.

Industry leaders like Matt Miller, CEO of Mobile Demand, and Elliott Eckert, VP & Co-Founder of Evolve Packaging LLC, share insights into sustainable packaging. From efficient design principles to automated systems streamlining the supply chain, the episode emphasizes the industry’s commitment to overcoming challenges tied to the increasing demand for eco-friendly solutions. It showcases the adaptability of the workforce, with technologies like dimensioning systems and AI integrations offering a glimpse into the developing job landscape. The takeaway is clear – sustainability requires not just greener materials but a workforce ready to embrace analytical thinking and technological shifts.

Opportunities in Sustainable Packaging Careers

Now, as the episode unfolds, it not only mentions the wave of opportunities in sustainable packaging but also highlights careers that transcend the conventional. In this journey, whether you’re an experienced professional or an aspiring enthusiast, check out careers that actively contribute to a future where responsible practices intricately shape the packaging industry. Moreover, for those eager to deepen their understanding of sustainability efforts within the supply chain, MHI’s Q3 Solutions magazine is a must-read, providing comprehensive insights and articles that delve into the latest developments and initiatives in sustainable practices.

Watch the Full Episode of “Jobs of Tomorrow” Now

As you join this enlightening journey into sustainable packaging, remember, it’s not just about uncovering what’s in the box; it’s about embracing the sustainable careers that sculpt the future of the industry. This full “Jobs of Tomorrow” episode is available for viewing on MHI view or Tubi.
